Importing/Pasting Data

Pasting

To import/paste data from another source, first go to the tab you wish to amend, then:

  1. Click Paste Data
  2. Ensure the correct "Data Type" is selected (the correct tab you're on)
  3. Ensure the correct "Data Source" is selected (see below for data sources)
  4. Paste your data into the "Data" textarea and click "Overwrite Data"

Note that if the interpreter manages to find data, it will overwrite the existing data on the page (and save it). Ensure that the data you have is correct as you can't undo!

Sources

Livescore

Accepted import types:

  • Meta
  • Teams
  • Statistics
  • Commentary

Steps to copy data:

  1. Visit Livescore.com
  2. Find the match you wish to import and click on the score - if it has data, you will see a popup window open with up to four tabs (Match Info, Commentary, Statistics, Line-ups)
  3. Visit the following tabs to import its respective data type:
    • Match Info: Meta
    • Commentary: Updates
    • Statistics: Stats
    • Line-ups: Teams
  4. Once you are on the desired tab, select all (ctrl + a or ⌘ + a)
  5. Copy the selection (ctrl + c or ⌘ + c)
  6. Paste your clipboard data into the textfield and select Overwite Data
